entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
